Tucson takes the same tunnel as the others just in the nick of time.  He su=
rfs it on two feet as he had done on the wave of water around the cave.  Hi=
s pace quickens as he sails out of the cave and onto safe ground with a bit=
 of a skid and slows just enough to transform and bolt on all fours.  He gr=
ins.

" Leo, where's your sense of adventure?  I knew I had to get out of t=
here, I was just seeing if you were paying attention.  Now, to seal this of=
f..  Hopefully that will prevent a major disaster."

He takes a firm stance=
 and readies his tail.

" Let's hope this works.  Stand back!"

He takes a =
swipe at the tunnel in hopes to seal it off safely.
